TextEng: No, stay here for now.
Yes, come with me.
Just wait here a while longer.
Yes, come with me.
No, never mind.
Yes, come with me.
Never mind.
I think we need to part ways.
All right, stay with me, then.
Just stay here for the moment.
Yes, you should go for now.
I'd like you to level up.
I want to change your tactics.
I don't want to change anything else right now.
Text: 지금은 다른 건 바꾸고 싶지 않아.

TextEng: I want to move faster and not bother with stealth or searching.
Text: 더 빠르게 이동하고 은신이나 탐색은 신경 쓰지 마.

TextEng: I need you to be stealthy right now.
Don't help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest.
Text: 잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패해도 도와주지 마.

TextEng: Help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest.
Text: 잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패하면 도와줘.

TextEng: I want to change the distance you stay away from me.
Stay a long distance away from me.
Keep a medium distance.
Stay close.
Go ahead and attack as soon as you see enemies.
Defend me and don't attack until I do.
Text: 나를 방어하고 내가 공격할 때까지 공격하지 마.

TextEng: I want to adjust your equipment.
Can you identify my equipment?
Text: 내 장비를 감정해 줄 수 있어?

TextEng: I need you to cast a spell.
Never mind.
No, that's it.
Virtue.
Ultravision.
True Seeing.
Summon Creature IX.
Summon Creature VIII.
Summon Creature VII.
Summon Creature VI.
Summon Creature V.
Summon Creature IV.
Summon Creature III.
Summon Creature II.
Summon Creature I.
Spell Resistance.
Shield of Faith.
See Invisibility.
Restoration.
Resistance.
Resist Elements.
Remove Fear.
Remove Disease.
Remove Curse.
Remove Blindness/Deafness.
Protection From Elements.
Planar Ally.
Owl's Wisdom.
Neutralize Poison.
Negative Energy Protection.
Mass Haste.
Mage Armor.
Light.
Lesser Restoration.
Invisibility Sphere.
Invisibility
Improved Invisibility.
Haste.
Greater Restoration.
Ghostly Visage.
Freedom of Movement.
Fox's Cunning
Find Traps.
Greater Sanctuary.
Ethereal Visage.
Entropic Shield.
Energy Buffer.
No, I've changed my mind.
Yes, go ahead.
Endure Elements.
Endurance.
Eagle's Splendour.
Divine Favor.
Death Ward.
Create Undead.
Create Greater Undead.
Continual Flame.
Clarity.
Cat's Grace.
Bull's Strength.
I've changed my mind.
Cast it on my animal companion.
Cast it on my familiar.
Cast it on me.
Cast it on yourself.
Bless.
Animate Dead.
Aid.
What was it you wanted to say earlier?
Let's stop and talk for a moment.
I think that's enough talking for now.
Text: 지금은 대화는 이 정도면 충분한 것 같아.

TextEng: How are you right now?
I want to discuss your training.
<StartAction>[Dorna will gain levels as both a cleric and a rogue.]</Start> Split your training between cleric and rogue.
Text: <StartAction>[도르나는 성직자와 도적으로 레벨을 올립니다.]</Start> 성직자와 도적 사이에 훈련을 나눠.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Dorna will gain levels as both a cleric and a rogue.]</Start> That's fine, continue as you are.
Text: <StartAction>[도르나는 성직자와 도적으로 레벨을 올립니다.]</Start> 괜찮아, 그대로 계속해.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Dorna will only gain levels as a rogue.]</Start> Concentrate on rogue training only.
Text: <StartAction>[도르나는 도적으로만 레벨을 올립니다.]</Start> 도적 훈련에만 집중해.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Dorna will only gain levels as a cleric.]</Start> I want to you concentrate on your cleric training only.
Text: <StartAction>[도르나는 성직자로만 레벨을 올립니다.]</Start> 성직자 훈련에만 집중했으면 해.

TextEng: Where is your ring? The one Drogan gave us?
Text: 네 반지는 어디 있어? 드로건이 우리에게 준 거 말이야?

TextEng: And where do you keep it?
There's no need to be suspicious of me.
You look troubled. Not that the situation doesn't call for it.
I don't care. There's far bigger things to worry about.
Text: 신경 안 써. 걱정할 일이 훨씬 더 많아.

TextEng: I figured you would offer eventually.
It wasn't my business to press the subject.
Then get on with what you need to say.
I have tried to see your side of things.
Seems like pointless dramatics to me. You're good at that.
Text: 나한테는 쓸데없는 감정 과잉으로 보여. 넌 그거 잘하지.

TextEng: A small change, but if it makes you happy, go ahead.
It sounds fine. I'm glad you found peace with it.
Text: 괜찮게 들려. 마음의 평화를 찾았다니 기뻐.

TextEng: Do you regret the way you left your home?
Ah, you just want too much.
Text: 아, 넌 그냥 너무 많은 걸 원해.

TextEng: It is too bad you couldn't find what you wanted there.
Text: 거기서 네가 원하는 걸 찾지 못한 건 안타까워.

TextEng: We are flighty? We outlive you.
Text: 우리가 변덕스럽다고? 우리는 너보다 오래 살아.

TextEng: I wouldn't go too far. We are who we are.
Text: 너무 그러지 마. 우리는 우리일 뿐이야.

TextEng: I don't think I can answer that for you.
Text: 그건 내가 대답할 수 없을 것 같아.

TextEng: Ask yourself, you're the one that ran away.
Text: 네 자신에게 물어봐, 도망친 건 너잖아.

TextEng: You left for your own well being. No harm in that.
Text: 네 안녕을 위해 떠났어. 잘못된 건 아냐.

TextEng: You paid the price for rocking the boat.
They were the worse offenders.
You were deciding what to say about your sister.
Text: 네 동생에 대해 무슨 말을 할지 고민하고 있었지.

TextEng: I'd starve too rather than come crawling back.
And she was too proud to ask for help?
Text: 그리고 도움을 청하기엔 너무 자존심이 셌어?

TextEng: How much did they get away with?
Who got hurt?
How long before they were caught?
What happened to your sister?
So who was responsible for this?
Hardly a victory for the clan.
She got what she deserved.
You just ran away like a coward?
There was nothing else you could do?
Text: 달리 할 수 있는 게 없었어?

TextEng: You were saying that your sister became an adventurer.
You're dodging the question.
I wanted adventure.
Nowhere else to go, really.
You're too needy. Always wanting more.
Text: 넌 너무 욕심이 많아. 항상 더 원하지.

TextEng: Was what you wanted all that bad?
Maybe if you finished your story I would understand better.
Text: 네 이야기를 끝까지 들으면 더 잘 이해할 수 있을 것 같아.

TextEng: You were about to tell me about your sister.
What was her name?
I'm listening.
Get to the point.
This is little different than you training with Drogan.
Text: 이건 네가 드로건과 훈련한 것과 별로 다르지 않아.

TextEng: So she was kicked out. So what?
I assume there is more to it than that?
You wouldn't have said anything if you didn't want to talk.
Text: 말하고 싶지 않았으면 아무 말도 안 했겠지.

TextEng: If that's all you want to say, that's your choice.
Text: 그게 하고 싶은 말의 전부라면, 네 선택이야.

TextEng: You said you gave up your name. Why?
Some piddling overblown disagreement, probably.
What happened to cause you to do this?
Text: 이런 일을 하게 된 원인이 뭐였어?

TextEng: I understand your anger at not being accepted.
Text: 받아들여지지 않은 것에 대한 네 분노를 이해해.

TextEng: Is that it? They lost; why let their opinion bother you?
Text: 그게 다야? 그들이 졌잖아. 왜 그들의 의견에 신경 써?

TextEng: Bah! A waste of my time.
If that is what you want.
Take your time. I'm only mildly interested anyway.
Text: 천천히 해. 어차피 관심도 별로 없어.

TextEng: Tell me about yourself. What led you to Drogan?
Text: 네 자신에 대해 말해 줘. 드로건에게 온 계기는 뭐야?

TextEng: So the spoiled little dwarf was looking for adventure. How novel.
Text: 응석받이 꼬마 드워프가 모험을 찾고 있었네. 참 새롭다.

TextEng: Bored with the traditional life, hmm?
You left your clan? A dwarf wouldn't do that.
Ran away from your oppressive parents, hmm?
So you simply left?
Sounds like you're a criminal on the run.
Still sounds like a token gesture.
What happened that made you feel this way?
No dwarf willfully gives up her name.
No, not just yet.
Yes, come with me.
It's a slave collar. A "gift" from the Asabi that rescued us.
Text: 노예 목걸이야. 우리를 구해준 아사비가 준 "선물"이지.

TextEng: Quit whining. We need to figure out what to do.
Text: 징징대지 마. 뭘 해야 할지 알아내야 해.

TextEng: I do too, but his training will help us in his place.
Text: 나도 그래, 하지만 그의 훈련이 그를 대신해 우리를 도울 거야.

TextEng: We have to think of ourselves!
You'd think you'd be a bit more grateful I restored you to flesh.
Text: 널 살로 되돌려줬는데 좀 더 고마워해야 하는 거 아냐.

TextEng: If that's all you can offer maybe you should just stay here.
Text: 그게 네가 할 수 있는 전부라면 그냥 여기 있어.

TextEng: It's overwhelming, but what else can we do? We go on.
Text: 압도적이지만, 달리 뭘 할 수 있겠어? 계속 가는 거지.

TextEng: I want you to stay here for now.
Come with me. We need to get moving.
Can you be useful if you are sightseeing like a fool?
Text: 바보처럼 구경이나 하면서 도움이 될 수 있겠어?

TextEng: Come on, then. Let's go.
You have an interest in history?
It's good to see you.
I want to look around on my own for a bit.
Yes, I think that would be wise.
Drogan said I should take someone. Sounds like baggage to me.
Text: 드로건이 누군가를 데려가라고 했어. 나한테는 짐처럼 들리는데.

TextEng: Bringing an extra pair of hands would be a good idea.
Text: 여분의 손이 더 있으면 좋을 것 같아.

TextEng: I'm not sure... perhaps I should check with Xanos.
Text: 확실하지 않은데... 자노스에게 확인해야 할 것 같아.

TextEng: I think that would be a good idea.
Not now Dorna! I'll let you know when I want to talk.
Text: 지금은 안 돼 도르나! 얘기하고 싶을 때 알려줄게.

TextEng: I'm sorry, this isn't a good time. Can it wait?
Text: 미안해, 지금은 좋은 때가 아냐. 기다릴 수 있어?

TextEng: I suppose I have the time right now. What is it?
Text: 지금 시간이 있는 것 같네. 뭔데?

TextEng: Keep your opinion to yourself.
Your tone says you don't like him.
Text: 네 어조를 들으니 그를 좋아하지 않는 것 같은데.

TextEng: You know it from one overheard conversation?
Is he a dwarf as well?
Duergar? Explain what that is.
Do you have any evidence that he has done something wrong?
You surpise me with your intolerance.
Warning noted. I'll be extra careful.
If Drogan knew him, he can't be all bad.
Text: 드로건이 그를 알았다면, 완전히 나쁠 순 없어.

TextEng: Pointless speculation. Let's just do what we have to.
Text: 쓸데없는 추측이야. 그냥 해야 할 일을 하자.

TextEng: Wishing doesn't help. We have to take what we need.
Text: 바라기만 해서는 안 돼. 필요한 걸 가져가야 해.

TextEng: As do I. We'll proceed carefully.
Leave if you want. My task is clear.
Text: 가고 싶으면 가. 내 임무는 분명해.

TextEng: Don't bother worrying. Just follow my lead.
Text: 걱정하지 마. 그냥 내 뒤를 따라와.

TextEng: Your caution will serve us well, I think.
Text: 네 신중함이 우리에게 도움이 될 거야.

TextEng: Bah. I'll use him like anyone else.
Text: 흥. 다른 사람들처럼 그를 이용할 거야.

TextEng: You aren't curious at all? He seemed sincere.
Text: 전혀 궁금하지 않아? 진심인 것 같던데.

TextEng: I agree, but what choice do we have for now?
Text: 동의해, 하지만 지금 우리에게 무슨 선택이 있겠어?

TextEng: Is that fear in your voice?
I'm more worried how the dragon got his information.
Text: 용이 어떻게 정보를 얻었는지가 더 걱정돼.

TextEng: Have you had any experience with dragons?
That's the spirit. We'll strip the place bare.
We're not here to loot. Keep focused.
Text: 우리는 약탈하러 온 게 아냐. 집중해.

TextEng: You have no trouble looting the dead?
Text: 죽은 자를 약탈하는 데 거리낌이 없어?

TextEng: Do you harbor some kind of grudge against elves?
You'll make any excuse to cover your greed!
And if you happen to profit, all the better.
Text: 그리고 이득을 보게 되면 더 좋고.

TextEng: You make too many assumptions. I'll be watching you.
What's that got to do with it?
Thank you for the insight. Be quiet now.
And we missed it. Just like at Drogan's.
I'd have fought hard too.
They should have fought harder. Weaklings.
Maybe there's a few kobolds left we can help mop-up.
Text: 우리가 청소를 도울 수 있는 코볼트 몇 마리가 남아있을 거야.

TextEng: Just like at the school. I'll make these kobolds pay.
Text: 학교에서처럼. 이 코볼트들에게 대가를 치르게 할 거야.

TextEng: I like the way you think.
You're not just in this for the gold, are you?
Suck it up and keep moving. Whining won't help.
He'll be fine. We'll make sure of it.
I don't know if he'll survive. There's a lot to do.
And if we make a little gold along the way, all the better.
Text: 그리고 가는 길에 금화를 좀 벌면 더 좋고.

TextEng: I also want to see these artifacts he kept hidden.
That's all I care about. We'll help him.
Text: 그게 내가 신경 쓰는 전부야. 그를 도울 거야.

TextEng: I guess so. It's a strange feeling, isn't it?
Yes. Our purpose is clear.
What, are you going to whine about that too?
I can't walk away from it. Not now.
If it was easy, we wouldn't need heroes.
If you have a problem with saving everyone, take a walk.
Yes, yes, we've both grown. Could we get on with it?
Text: 그래, 그래, 우리 둘 다 성장했어. 이제 진행할까?

TextEng: I don't think anyone planned for this.
Like I have a choice.
I am.
He was a wise man. Could he have known?
Get to the point, Dorna.
Considering where we are, I'd believe anything.
Text: 우리가 어디 있는지 생각하면, 뭐든 믿을 수 있어.

TextEng: I can feel it, too. It's not like an earthquake.
Text: 나도 느껴. 지진 같은 게 아냐.

TextEng: Move on. We're still in danger.
It was his time.
Well you don't have to yell at me about it.
Drogan would not want us to despair.
Text: 드로건은 우리가 절망하길 원하지 않았을 거야.

TextEng: He gave us a chance. We need to use it as best we can.
Text: 그는 우리에게 기회를 줬어. 최선을 다해 사용해야 해.

TextEng: Look, you're going to have to move on.
Our skill saved him once. He knew we were worthy.
Text: 우리의 실력이 그를 한 번 구했어. 그는 우리가 가치 있다는 걸 알았어.

TextEng: You don't have any answers as a cleric?
Just so long as you move on. We have to go.
Honor him while *you* live. That's all anyone can do.
Text: *네*가 살아 있는 동안 그를 기려. 누구나 할 수 있는 건 그게 전부야.

TextEng: Are you finished yet?
Let's go. We can't delay any longer.
Text: 가자. 더 이상 지체할 수 없어.

TextEng: Amen.
I won't let it fall into the wrong hands.
Text: 잘못된 손에 넘어가게 두지 않을 거야.

TextEng: There's got to be a way to use this to our benefit.
Text: 이걸 우리에게 유리하게 사용할 방법이 있을 거야.

TextEng: Or just two.
Where's the fun in knowing all the answers?
Text: 모든 답을 아는 게 무슨 재미야?

TextEng: Is your greed turning to fear?
Do you think his trust is misplaced?
Text: 그의 신뢰가 잘못 놓인 것 같아?

TextEng: We'll do okay. Drogan knows it.
What, we look almost professional.
Yes, wasting time. Let's go.
It's strange, but I like it.
Step up and prove yourself or go home.
So am I. Stay here for now.
No apology needed, but stay here a while to recover.
Text: 사과는 필요 없어, 하지만 회복하려면 여기 좀 있어.

TextEng: Be more careful or it'll happen again. Let's go.
Text: 더 조심해, 아니면 또 일어날 거야. 가자.

TextEng: No, I apologize for letting you fall. Welcome back.
Text: 아니, 널 넘어뜨린 건 미안해. 다시 돌아온 걸 환영해.
